title: goerli network v2.28.1 upgrade runtime error: slice bounds out of range
body:
Encounter error when upgrading to v2.28.1 using docker image thorax/erigon:v2.28.1
The upgrade is  go well and synced a few hundred blocks,  then  `runtime error: slice bounds out of range` occurred at block height 7783302. block sync stopped after the error.

#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`
v2.28.1

OS & Version: Linux
#### Actual behaviour

2022-10-17 12:29:48 | [EROR] [10-17\|04:29:48.952] Staged Sync                              err="runtime error: slice bounds out of range [24:16], snapshot: 7000000-7500000, trace: [block_reader.go:509 panic.go:884 panic.go:153 decompress.go:541 block_reader.go:524 block_reader.go:281 block_snapshots.go:268 block_reader.go:275 stage_headers.go:481 stage_headers.go:207 stage_headers.go:140 default_stages.go:36 sync.go:345 sync.go:255 stageloop.go:173 stageloop.go:93 asm_amd64.s:1594], trace: [stageloop.go:139 panic.go:890 block_reader.go:509 panic.go:884 panic.go:153 decompress.go:541 block_reader.go:524 block_reader.go:281 block_snapshots.go:268 block_reader.go:275 stage_headers.go:481 stage_headers.go:207 stage_headers.go:140 default_stages.go:36 sync.go:345 sync.go:255 stageloop.go:173 stageloop.go:93 asm_amd64.s:1594]"
